alert.note: Alert for Marathon; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wood and southwestern Marathon Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 930 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Owen to near Loyal to 7 miles north of Hatfield. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Spencer around 950 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Marshfield, Wisconsin Rapids and Babcock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
